node.name: player1
node.text: I think that it is a major problem.

node.name: player1
node.text: For example natural resources such as land and energy become scarce

node.name: player2
node.text: I am not so sure the situation is different for different countries

node.name: player2
node.text: I think that Developing and developed countries face different problems with respect to overpopulation

node.name: player1
node.text: I agree, maybe I had too general a view on this

node.name: player2
node.text: I think that it is a minor hurdle in society

node.name: player1
node.text: I think that problems of overpopulation can be compensated by davances in technology and planning

node.name: player2
node.text: I also think so because it is a problem of smart allocation of resources
